long_description: A full color guide with clear knot-tying illustrations,. Author: Bob Gaines. Softcover; 172 pages; color photographs and maps. Falcon Publishing, Inc.; copyright 2013. Covers vital information on all aspects of rappelling, from rigging simple rope and anchor systems to dealing with complicated emergency situations. Includes a comprehensive discussion of ropes, slings and all hardware used in rappelling. .
short_description: A full color guide with clear knot-tying illustrations, Rappelling offers everything you need to know about descending on a rope, including knots, rigging strategies, rappel devices and safety.
